Center for Entrepreneurship
                                        
    		Center for Entrepreneurship
    	Do you want to be around innovative thinkers like you? Do you want to land a job at a high-growth company? The Center for Entrepreneurship is dedicated to providing the resources, inspiration, support, and mentorship to help inspired learners and doers develop ideas and launch valuable businesses. We seek to build a cohesive and collaborative interdisciplinary environment that brings together the resources of the university, community and private sector. Whether you're looking to start a business or just expand your creative toolbox, entrepreneurship skills can help you do it all! Take One ClassWondering if entrepreneurship is right for you? Introduction to Entrepreneurship (MGMT 450) is a highly experiential class that provides hands-on learning about launching a product or service through customer discovery. Get InvolvedThe Collegiate Entrepreneurs' Organization (CEO)  is designed to inspire, motivate and educate the entrepreneurs of Chico State in order to create more opportunities for success. The organization's mission is to provide resources and networking opportunities necessary to foster entrepreneurship, enabling young professionals to launch their ideas by developing and executing new ventures.Build a PrototypeIf you have an idea for a product and want to bring it to life, visit the Chico State Makerspace in the Meriam Library where you can experiment, create, explore, and collaborate! They offer a variety of tools and equipment, along with a team of student advisors dedicated to helping students with designing and making their own creative projects.BlueTechValleyIf you have a new innovation for concept in the areas of agriculture, water, or energy, the BlueTechValley program can help you launch through their accelerator or funding program.Glenn Hall 219530-898-4821Upcoming Events All COB events Entrepreneurship Student Finds Niche in the Business of ExcellenceCenter for Entrepreneurship Announces New DirectorMakerspace Allows Students to Turn Their Ideas Into RealityContact Us  Eva Shepherd-Nicoll, Director elshepherd-nicoll@csuchico.eduCollege of BusinessTehama Hall 301 530-898-6272bus@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/cobSupport our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioDepartmentsInformation Systems, Finance & AccountingManagementMarketingMBA Program
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
